Desc.entry: Manages Tinsley Community Centre, which is used for various activities including over 60s keep-fit (women only), Asian healthy eating meal, over 60s group (see separate entry), bingo night, disabled and elderly luncheon group (see separate entry). Holds events such as Health Daysand children's events. Venue available for children's parties on weekends.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Various times, please contact for details (community meetings)

category.entry: COMMUNITY CENTRES AND ASSOCIATIONS - POSTAL DISTRICT 9
